Let's Work Together!

Reach out with the form below.


Here's the process.

Initial Project Discussion

We will review exactly what you goal is with the project. We will discuss expectations, assets, branding, and time-tables.

Estimate Given

I typically work by estimate rather that hourly, but i'm open to special situations.

Begin Work

We'll get a writtent agreement in place. Then a partial payment up-front is due, depending on the project. As soon as I get a green light from you, I'll begin work.

Check-ins

Reviews are scheduled periodically throughout the process, as checkpoints and/or opportunities for client feedback on work that's been finished up to that point. we'll hop on skype or a phone call to stay on the same page. Communication throughtout the process is important!

Final Revisions

Once I've reached the end of the project, the client has the opportunity to request final revisions to be made.

Project End

Once the project is finished, and final payment for work has been paid by the client, I will push the site live and handover the keys!

My home base is on the beautiful Corpus Christi Bay, but I do remote work as well.
Let's build something together!
